title: Classic Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe
description: This chicken Caesar salad is delicious and satisfying with crunchy romaine, juicy chicken, seasoned croutons, rich Parmesan, and a creamy bottled dressing.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Everyday Cooking Classic Chicken Caesar Salad 4.6 (18) 13 Reviews 11 Photos A classic recipe for a reason, this chicken Caesar salad is delicious and satisfying. Crunchy romaine, creamy dressing, tender chicken, and savory cheese come together for a tasty favorite. Serve a lemon wedge with each salad if desired. Submitted by Cracker Barrel Updated on June 8, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 11 11 11 11 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 6 cups tightly packed chopped romaine lettuce 1 pound cooked boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips ½ cup finely shredded Parmesan cheese, such as Cracker Barrel ½ cup seasoned croutons ¼ cup creamy Caesar dressing, such as Kraft Directions Arrange lettuce on four serving plates. Top with chicken, Parmesan, and croutons, then drizzle with dressing. Recipe Tip You can use sliced, cooked steak instead of chicken. I Made It Print 120 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 333 Calories 17g Fat 6g Carbs 36g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 333 % Daily Value * Total Fat 17g 21% Saturated Fat 5g 26% Cholesterol 90mg 30% Sodium 385mg 17% Total Carbohydrate 6g 2% Dietary Fiber 2g 7% Total Sugars 1g Protein 36g 73% Vitamin C 20mg 22% Calcium 47mg 4% Iron 2mg 11% Potassium 419mg 9% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Classic Chicken Caesar Salad 01 of 11 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 11 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 03/03/2025 A keeper! Easy to follow Worth the effort Great flavors I made this for myself this evening. It was great and I ate a huge salad with an air fried chicken breast. I will make this again. I didn't deviate much from the recipe. I added green onion, Rene Caesar salad dressing, bacon bits, and sliced almonds. 03 of 11 Photo by  Kaleo 04/27/2021 04 of 11 Photo by  accessamanda 06/08/2020 05 of 11 Photo by  HealthyRecipes 11/11/2019 06 of 11 Photo by  682sthrngrl 07/18/2016 07 of 11 Photo by  Clarissa Pereira 05/04/2016 08 of 11 Photo by  Chef V 03/21/2016 This is a great way to use up leftover chicken. I placed the lettuce and dressing in a large bowl and tossed all till combined. From there portioned onto plates and placed a sliced grilled Chicken breast on top. Sprinkled with a little more cheese and homemade croutons. Definitely a very simple recipe.. But sometimes you need that inspiration for dinner or lunch! My only suggestion is to use your favourite Caesar dressing whether it be homemade or a not.. As that really will make or break the dish. 09 of 11 Photo by  Bren 03/17/2016 We love a good caesar salad and eat it often. The ratio of lettuce to dressing was perfect. I used home made croutons that I seasoned simply with garlic powder, okive oil and parsley before baking. The chicken was seasoned with Italian seasoning to complement the salad. In the future I will add green onions and perhaps a little crumbled bacon. #Ad #EndWithAmazing #AllrecipesAllstarsCA 10 of 11 Photo by  Roseanne 03/15/2016 I don't usually like caesar salad but thoroughly enjoyed this salad. When cooking the chicken, I sprinkled an additional bit of Parmesan cheese. Delicious and filling. #EndWithAmazing #Ad #AllrecipesAllstarsCA 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Easy and Fast Cajun Chicken Caesar Salad 105 Ratings Strawberry-Feta Chicken Salad with Roasted Strawberry-Balsamic Dressing 2 Ratings Summertime Chicken and Pasta Salad 8 Ratings Warm Chicken, Bacon, and Egg Salad with Mayonnaise Dressing 2 Ratings Grilled Chicken Citrus Salad 21 Ratings Crispy Chicken Salad with Yummy Honey Mustard Dressing 2 Ratings Asian Chicken Salad 630 Ratings Chinese Chicken Salad 55 Ratings Grilled Chicken, Peach, and Arugula Salad 40 Ratings Za'atar Chicken Salad with Lemon-Tahini Dressing 2 Ratings Chicken Caesar Salad on a Stick 4 Ratings Grilled Lemon-Pepper Chicken Salad 1 Rating Balsamic Chicken Salad 7 Ratings Grilled Chicken Salad with Seasonal Fruit 267 Ratings Mexican Chicken and Black Bean Salad 71 Ratings Mexican Chicken and Corn Salad 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Cracker Barrel
instructions: Arrange lettuce on four serving plates. Top with chicken, Parmesan, and croutons, then drizzle with dressing.
